output: html_document

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(error = TRUE)
```

### Demo

Use `complete()` to fill in the implicit NA's.

```{r}
gapminder %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  arrange(year) %>% 
  mutate(inc = lifeExp - lag(lifeExp)) %>% 
  filter(inc < 0)
```
